chunk:
Suki Exfoliate Foaming Cleanser

Brand: suki

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: sucrose, potassium cocoate , oryza sativa (rice) flour , cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass) leaf oil, avena sativa (oat) kernel flour, citrus aurantifolia (lime) peel oil, citrus sinensis (orange) peel extract , squalane, chamomilla recutita (matricaria) flower/leaf extract, calendula officinalis flower extract, lavandula angustifolia

aurantifolia (lime) peel oil, citrus sinensis (orange) peel extract , squalane, chamomilla recutita (matricaria) flower/leaf extract, calendula officinalis flower extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower extract, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, olea europaea (olive) fruit oil, ascophyllum nodosum (atlantic kelp) extract ,

officinalis flower extract, lavandula angustifolia (lavender) flower extract, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, olea europaea (olive) fruit oil, ascophyllum nodosum (atlantic kelp) extract , zingiber officinale (ginger) root oil, ethyl alcohol, water (aqua), limonene*, citral*, geraniol
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
